name: Bulbous Violet
description: The Bulbous Violet is a Medium-sized plant creature with notable physical attributes, including strong tendrils used for grappling. Its appearance allows it to blend in with flowering plants while remaining motionless.
memorable: It can blend into surroundings and inflict persistent acid damage while grappling.
goals: To ambush flesh-based creatures that come too close.
relations: Likely found in environments with other plant creatures or species that share its habitat.
environment: Can be found in flora-rich areas, mimicking large flowering plants.
strengths: Good Strength and Dexterity make it effective in grappling and mobility.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, making it simple-minded and uncharismatic.
attacks: Uses tendril attacks to inflict bludgeoning and acid damage while grappling.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Sacs ability that deals retaliatory acid damage to nearby creatures when harmed.
senses: Has Flesh Sense, allowing it to detect flesh-based creatures within 60 feet by scent.
additional_information: Blend in with large flowering plants when motionless.
Regains hit points when grappling targets is reduced to 0 hit points.
Can grapple two targets simultaneously with its tendrils.
Deals persistent acid damage while grappling.
Very poor reasoning and problem-solving abilities.
test_queries: bulbous plant that blends into flowers
creature that detects flesh by scent
